# Code of Conduct

### Expected behaviour

- Be respectful, assume good faith, and focus on technical issues.
- Use inclusive language and avoid discriminatory or demeaning remarks.
- Protect privacy: do not post othersâ€™ personal information or production-sensitive data, credentials, or secrets.

### Unacceptable behaviour
- Harassment, threats, hateful or sexually explicit language, doxxing, or sustained disruptive conduct.
- Posting or attempting to share production-sensitive datasets, credentials, or other secrets in public channels or PRs.
- Coercion of any kind.

### Reporting
- For general conduct reports email arc.tre[at]ucl.ac.uk.

### Enforcement
- Maintainers or designated conduct officers may remove or redact violating content, warn users, or restrict access.
- For incidents involving data or security risk, we may take immediate mitigation by, for example, revoking access.
- Reports are handled confidentially and shared only on a need-to-know basis.
